thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com | 2 of 15
thread.title: Margaret
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text: We had an absolutely amazing trip and our agent was so easy to work with. Very responsive, lots of great info and suggestions. We had a vague idea of what we wanted to do and he helped us make it a reality. Car service and guides were all prompt, friendly, and full of great info about the country. We will absolutely recommend this company and will be back to Costa Rica soon!
